text: "Ain't Nobody" is a song by the American soul music group Rufus and singer Chaka Khan. It was released in September 1983 as the lead single from the group's live album, Stompin' at the Savoy. It was written by David "Hawk" Wolinski and produced by Russ Titelman. It became a signature song for both Rufus and Khan. The song reached number 22 on the Hot 100 in the US and reached number one on the R&B; chart. == References == Category:1983 songs Category:R&B; songs Category:Funk songs Category:Soul songs Category:Mary J. Blige songs Category:Chaka Khan songs Category:LL Cool J songs Category:Marcia Hines songs
title: Ain't Nobody
